apple: Apple chose explicitly to not have its logo in the footer.
beginner: Just getting started? Have a look here http://docs.webplatform.org/wiki/beginners
blog: Generic information about Web Platform can be found here http://blog.webplatform.org/
bugs: So you found a bug on the webplatform, report it here https://www.w3.org/Bugs/Public/enter_bug.cgi?product=webplatform.org
bugfiling: Need some help on filing a bug? Have a look here http://docs.webplatform.org/wiki/WPD:Filing_Bugs
contribute: A guide to get started contributing can be found here: http://docs.webplatform.org/wiki/WPD:Getting_Started.
docs: Web Platform Docs starting point from here http://docs.webplatform.org/wiki/
forum: Q&A for all your questions and answers, have a look here http://talk.webplatform.org/forums/
pr: My source code is hosted on GitHub: https://github.com/tobie/wpdbot. Please fork me and send a pull request with your requested changes.
tutorials: All tutorials and hands-on lessons about implementing web technology can be found here http://docs.webplatform.org/wiki/tutorials
